verses.verse: בִּשְׁנַ֨ת <WH8141> year עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <WH6242> twenty וָשֶׁ֙בַע֙ <WH7651> and seventh שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> year לְיָרָבְעָ֖ם <WH3379> of Jeroboam מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel מָלַ֛ךְ <WH4427> to reign עֲזַרְיָ֥ה <WH5838> began Azariah בֶן־ <WH1121> son אֲמַצְיָ֖ה <WH558> of Amaziah מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> of Judah

בֶּן־ <WH1121> old שֵׁ֨שׁ <WH8337> six עֶשְׂרֵ֤ה <WH6240> teen שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> years הָיָ֣ה <WH1961> become בְמָלְכ֔וֹ <WH4427> was he when he began to reign וַחֲמִשִּׁ֤ים <WH2572> and fifty וּשְׁתַּ֙יִם֙ <WH8147> two שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> years מָלַ֖ךְ <WH4427> and he reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> in Jerusalem וְשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> name אִמּ֔וֹ <WH517> And his mother's יְכָלְיָ֖הוּ <WH3203> [was] Jecholiah מִירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> of Jerusalem

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> And he did הַיָּשָׁ֖ר <WH3477> [that which was] right בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD כְּכֹ֥ל <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> had done אֲמַצְיָ֥הוּ <WH558> Amaziah אָבִֽיו׃ <WH1> according to all that his father

רַ֥ק <WH7535> but הַבָּמ֖וֹת <WH1116> Save that the high places לֹא־ <WH3808> were not סָ֑רוּ <WH5493> were not removed ע֥וֹד <WH5750> still הָעָ֛ם <WH5971> the people מְזַבְּחִ֥ים <WH2076> sacrificed וּֽמְקַטְּרִ֖ים <WH6999> and burnt incense בַּבָּמֽוֹת׃ <WH1116> still on the high places

וַיְנַגַּ֨ע <WH5060> smote יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <WH4428> the king וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> become מְצֹרָע֙ <WH6879> so that he was a leper עַד־ <WH5704> against י֣וֹם <WH3117> unto the day מֹת֔וֹ <WH4194> of his death וַיֵּ֖שֶׁב <WH3427> and dwelt בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> house הַחָפְשִׁ֑ית <WH2669> in a several וְיוֹתָ֤ם <WH3147> And Jotham בֶּן־ <WH1121> son הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> the king's עַל־ <WH5921> was over הַבַּ֔יִת <WH1004> [was] over the house שֹׁפֵ֖ט <WH8199> judging אֶת־ <WH853> עַ֥ם <WH5971> the people הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the land

וַיִּשְׁכַּ֤ב <WH7901> slept עֲזַרְיָה֙ <WH5838> So Azariah עִם־ <WH5973> with אֲבֹתָ֔יו <WH1> with his fathers וַיִּקְבְּר֥וּ <WH6912> and they buried אֹת֛וֹ <WH853> עִם־ <WH5973> with אֲבֹתָ֖יו <WH1> him with his fathers בְּעִ֣יר <WH5892> in the city דָּוִ֑ד <WH1732> of David וַיִּמְלֹ֛ךְ <WH4427> reigned יוֹתָ֥ם <WH3147> and Jotham בְּנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <WH8478> his place פ
